title: How to Record a Call on Google Voice

steps.title: Click the Settings icon.
steps.content: Click the Settings icon. This icon will be on the top right of the screen and resembles a gear.

steps.title: Select the checkbox next to “Call Options.”
steps.content: Select the checkbox next to “Call Options.”

steps.title: Receive the call on your Google Voice number.
steps.content: Receive the call on your Google Voice number.

steps.title: Press 4 on your phone handset.
steps.content: Press 4 on your phone handset. You can press 4 at the time of taking or during the call.

steps.title: Listen to the automated "Call recording on" message.
steps.content: Listen to the automated "Call recording on" message. This will play for all parties on the phone.

steps.title: Continue talking as your call is recorded.
steps.content: Continue talking as your call is recorded. Press 4 again at any time to end the recording. A copy of the recording will be saved in your Google Voice inbox. Hanging up will also end the recording.
